author: Nostalgia Nerd
description:
Santa went online in 1986; yes, really. BT’s Microlink service let anyone type “SANTA” at the prompt and send a direct message to the North Pole. Kids asked for BBC Micros; adults asked for… significantly less wholesome gifts. Within a week the system was flooded; more than a third of the 6,000 messages came from drunk or mischievous grown-ups. This is the forgotten story of the first time Santa was trolled online.

#RetroTech #Christmas #80sTech #Microlink #TelecomGold #Santa #History #VintageComputing #Nostalgia #BBCMicro
title: When Santa's Online Grotto Went Lewd... #christmas #retrochristmas #retro
